Articles.Content:
Right now, there's this handy feature that if you left-click on the AP or PE, it keeps the extra-information (like when you mouse over it) displayed, even when you remove your mouse pointer from it.

Awesome idea, except making a node is also a left-click thing. There have been many times when I've tried to left-click on the AP or PE and kept getting the option to make a node instead. (And plenty of times when I've tried to make a node, but couldn't for various reasons, but that's something for another post I supposed.)

So, Squad, if you could make the right-click on the AP and PE do what the Left-Click does right now, I would be elated and think that was awesome.
